text: Joey DeFrancesco (April 10, 1971August 25, 2022) was an American jazz organist, trumpeter, saxophonist, and singer. He released more than 30 albums under. DeFrancesco died at his home in Phoenix, Arizona on August 25, 2022, at the age of 51. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American jazz pianists Category:American saxophonists Category:American keyboardists Category:American trumpeters Category:Musicians from Pennsylvania
title: Joey DeFrancesco
